text: Egha a uan amuim ko namakaba bizir a bativizibar gun bar me mɨkeme. An amuim ko an namakar fofozir avɨriba itiba, me kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Datɨrɨghɨn nɨn ziam ko gavgavim Mordekai nɨ dama a iniasa. A Judan gumazim, nɨ anebɨnsɨ damuva avegham. A nɨ dɨkabɨragh nɨ agɨvagham. Eghtɨ nɨ puram an guraghav ikiam.”
